name: Three Card Basic
description: A versatile spread offering insights into a situation's progression or different facets of a question.

card_positions.name: Past
card_positions.description: Influences from the past that are relevant to the query, or the foundation of the situation.

card_positions.name: Present
card_positions.description: The current state of the situation, your current feelings, or the central challenge/opportunity.

card_positions.name: Future
card_positions.description: The potential outcome or direction if things continue on their current path; advice for moving forward.

name: Celtic Cross
description: A comprehensive and traditional spread that delves deep into a situation from multiple angles, offering a detailed perspective.

card_positions.name: The Heart of the Matter / Present Situation
card_positions.description: Represents the core of the querent's situation or question.

card_positions.name: Crossing Influences / Immediate Challenge
card_positions.description: The immediate challenge or obstacle affecting the situation. This card is placed across the first.

card_positions.name: The Foundation / Distant Past
card_positions.description: The underlying basis of the situation, events from the more distant past.

card_positions.name: Recent Past / Passing Influences
card_positions.description: Events or influences that have just passed or are now waning.

card_positions.name: Possible Outcome / Crown of Potential
card_positions.description: What could be achieved or the best possible outcome that can be hoped for given the circumstances.

card_positions.name: Near Future / Approaching Influences
card_positions.description: What is likely to happen in the near future.

card_positions.name: Self / The Querent's Attitude
card_positions.description: The querent's current feelings, attitude, or role in the situation.

card_positions.name: External Environment / Others' Influence
card_positions.description: The influence of others, external circumstances, or the atmosphere surrounding the situation.

card_positions.name: Hopes and Fears
card_positions.description: The querent's hopes or fears regarding the situation.

card_positions.name: Final Outcome / Resolution
card_positions.description: The ultimate outcome or resolution of the situation, taking all other cards into account.

name: Relationship Dynamics
description: Explores the dynamics between two people in a relationship.

card_positions.name: You (Querent)
card_positions.description: Your perspective, feelings, and role in the relationship.

card_positions.name: The Other Person
card_positions.description: Their perspective, feelings, and role in the relationship.

card_positions.name: Current Dynamics / Connection
card_positions.description: The current state of the relationship, the energy connecting you.

card_positions.name: Strengths of the Relationship
card_positions.description: The positive aspects and strengths that support the connection.

card_positions.name: Challenges in the Relationship
card_positions.description: Obstacles or difficulties that need to be addressed.

card_positions.name: Guidance / Path Forward
card_positions.description: Advice or the potential direction for the relationship to evolve healthily.
